thread.title: Drifters who murdered tantra teacher get second murder rap
thread.title_full: Drifters who murdered tantra teacher get second murder rap - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Drifters who murdered tantra teacher get second murder rap
text:
Multnomah Co. Sheriff�s Office (L to R) Sean Michael Angold, 24, Morrison Haze Lampley, 23, and Lila Scott Alligood, 18, are now accused of two murders over three days in the Bay Area, police said. The drifters who gunned down a yoga teacher on a Bay Area trail had claimed their first murder victim two days earlier, police said Thursday.
Investigators have linked Morrison Haze Lampley, 23, Sean Michael Angold, 24, and Lila Scott Alligood, 18, to the Saturday morning slaying of a Canadian backpacker in San Francisco’s Golden Gate Park, the San Francisco Chronicle reported .
The trio, who were arrested Wednesday, had already been accused of killing tantric sex therapist Steve Carter on Monday near Fairfax in Marin County. They had tried to sell Carter’s station wagon at the Portland soup kitchen where officers tracked them down with the help of the car’s GPS system, police told the Chronicle .
EstaticLiving.com Steve Carter (r) was found fatally shot near Fairfax in Marin County on Monday. He and his wife Lokita Carter (l) founded the Ecstatic Living Institute in Middletown, Calif. Yet they also had “personal property” in their possession that belonged to slain 23-year-old Audrey Carey, according to the Marin County Sheriff's Office .
A passerby found Carey lying facedown in the park the morning after the first day of the Hardly Strictly Bluegrass Festival. Paramedics pronounced her dead on the spot, and medical examiners ruled her death a homicide, officials in the San Francisco Police Department said .
San Francisco Police Audrey Carey, 23, was found killed in San Francisco's Golden Gate Park. Carey was just starting off on a backpacking trip that would take her all over Europe when she was killed, KPIX-TV reported .
Detectives in San Francisco and Marin County began comparing notes after her death because both Carey and Carter were shot in wooded or park areas, the Chronicle reported.
Now Lampley, Angold and Alligood will also face robbery and murder charges in Carey’s death to go with their murder rap in Carter’s death. Police plan to release more details in the case on Friday.
